_header: As I went me for to solace / I heard a man sigh
Subjects: death, fear of; carols, of mortality
_description: ‘The dred of deth do troble me’ — eight quatrains (aaab) with this refrain and burden: ‘Evermore wheresoeuer I be / The dred off deth do troble me’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
As I went me fore to solaseI hard a mane fyght & sey a
                    lase…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…And kepe vs fro þe fendes powerffor þan dred off
                    deth shal not troble me
